PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2007-19552007-12-13,  TBS,  ,  , 
ActPublic Sector Pension Investment Board Act
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE PUBLIC SECTOR PENSION INVESTMENT BOARD REGULATIONS which allows the PSPIB to invest in derivatives only for the purpose of reducing the risks associated with existing investments, or as an alternative to investing in the underlying asset from which the derivative obtains its value.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2007-0304 Publication Date: 2007-12-26

act: Public Sector Pension Investment Board Act
precis: REGULATIONS AMENDING THE PUBLIC SECTOR PENSION INVESTMENT BOARD REGULATIONS which allows the PSPIB to invest in derivatives only for the purpose of reducing the risks associated with existing investments, or as an alternative to investing in the underlying asset from which the derivative obtains its value.
